channel.title: [639] NPC Animations
channel.description: Does anyone have a list or a dump or something of animations for npcs? I need the attack/block/death animations for a few NPC's like the bulwark beast, astea frostweb, hope devourer, etc. (Mostly dungeoneering boss npc's lol)
